titles.title: Authorizing the 1995 Special Olympics Torch Relay to be run through the Capitol Grounds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 104-113.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 44.

action.text: Mr. Gilchrest asked unanimous consent to consider the resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/1/1995--Introduced. Permits the 1995 Special Olympics Torch Relay to be run through the Capitol Grounds.
